sentences.en: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of an involuntary life-affecting desire.
sentences.cn: 坠入爱河是一个欲望不由自主影响人生的经典案例。

sentences.en: It is paradigmatic of new situations.
sentences.cn: 这是新形势的典型特色.

sentences.en: Similar to antonymous paradigmatic relation , differentiated paradigmatic relation is created from peoples psychological association.
sentences.cn: 像反义聚合一样,别义聚合也是在人们心理联想的基础上形成的.

sentences.en: Synonym that expresses the same or similar conception is a particular paradigmatic relation of Chinese vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 同义词,表达相同、相近的概念,是汉语词汇中一种特殊的聚合关系,广泛存在于典籍文献中.

sentences.en: Synonymy is a realization of semantic paradigmatic relationship.
sentences.cn: 摘要同义关系是词义聚合的重要表现.

sentences.en: Their great academic success was paraded as paradigmatic.
sentences.cn: 他们辉煌的学术成就被当作了典范。

trans.tran_cn: 范例的，<语>词形变化（表）的
